description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students who are pursuing coursework in Adult Education. Eligibility Requirements Open to a graduate student pursuing coursework in Adult Education Demonstrates academic achievement Demonstrates financial need Preference given to students who are employed as an educator, and striving to balance school, work and home Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
